about_the_game:
Welcome to the magical realm of Peppermint Falls, a place where dreams are dipped in sugar and every day is a festival of sweetness! Dive into an entrancing adventure where marshmallow flowers bloom, gummy froggos hop around, and candy citizens await your friendship. Journey through this delightful world with your extraordinary friend - a sentient, pancake-made house that walks!



Your farm is a utopia for sweet-toothed dreamers! Here, blueberry muffins sprout like pumpkins, gummy bears dangle from bushes, and ice cream blooms in winter. Imagine cows that offer strawberry milk and chickens laying delectable chocolate eggs. It's a confectioner's paradise!



In the small, yet cozy town of Peppermint Falls, there is some work for anyone. Whether it's cooking meals, experimenting with alchemy, mining for treasures, fishing for wondrous creatures, traveling, or recording incredible stories in your diary, the choice is yours. Will you battle monsters or work in a town’s café?



Peppermint Falls is a tiny town, but the world around it is huge and full of mysteries! Investigate varying biomes with your unique companion - a walking house made of pancakes. It won’t only deliver you to the farthest corners of the world, but will also patiently wait for you in front of the woods and caverns. And guess what? It'll even sprout snug flapjack rooms to cozy up your home over time!



In this sugary world, vibrant characters await your friendship. Uncover their stories, build bonds of friendship or romance, and perhaps start a sweet family of your own.



Once, this world was home to ordinary beings. Now, it's a land of confectionary creatures with stories to tell. Piece together the mystical history of this captivating world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10-compatible graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Peppermint Falls is a farming simulator set in an enchanting world of sweets. Cultivate delightful candy plants, explore the world with your whimsical pancake house companion, forge friendships with charming confectionary inhabitants, and discover fabled mysteries!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
